item.description:
Maine Ruby will meet this coming Monday the 22nd at 7pm.

Same venue as last month Adam and Renae Bair's home (118 Tucker Ave,
Portland, Maine) with pizza and beer provided by Intridea. Seemed to
work out great last time.

I'll present a gem of mine, Lasso, that just had a new version
released and there'll be some discussion on RubyConf X, which
@codeofficer and I attended; we'll be asking for other attendees to
show what they've been working on as well.

Maine Ruby - November
Mnoday November 22th @ 7pm
118 Tucker Ave, Portland, Maine

We'll have a book drawing and a Twitter+RSVP contest, so follow @maineruby.

Hope to see everyone there.

group.name: The Portland Maine Ruby Meetup Group

item.name: Maine Ruby Meetup
